notes: This file tracks iteration state within a single run
runId: Timestamp when this run started (null = needs initialization)
storiesCheckedThisRun: Story IDs that have been processed in this run
skipPushedTasks: Set to true to skip all 'pushed' status tasks and only work on new development
enableMergeBackoff: Set to false to disable all post-merge monitoring (default: true)
mergeBackoffStoryIds: Array of story IDs to check (e.g., ['US-012', 'US-013']), or null to check all merged stories
